platform-activity.title-1: 2025 China Enterprises Going Global and Global Professional Services Conference
platform-activity.desc-1: This exclusive event provides a valuable face-to-face exchange platform for Chinese business executives, government officials, industry representatives, and leading overseas professionals and thought leaders. The forum fosters two-way interactions, helping Chinese enterprises explore international opportunities and establish direct connections with global experts, while also offering professional service firms a unique opportunity to engage directly with China's most ambitious corporate decision-makers.Focusing on international expansion, the forum facilitates face-to-face discussions with CEOs, CFOs, General Counsels, and other senior representatives of Chinese companies seeking global partnerships and expertise. Through insightful discussions, networking events, and roundtable meetings, participants will build long-term relationships, gain new perspectives, and explore potential partnerships to support growth and global ambitions.The forum aims to strengthen connections between Chinese enterprises and international service providers, offering strategic insights on overseas investment planning, risk management, global expansion strategies, and key financial and compliance considerations. By attending, you will have the opportunity to showcase your company’s expertise, participate in critical discussions, and connect with senior leaders considering global expansion.
platform-activity.title-2: Establishment of Changping Development-Leadvisor Global Overseas Service Center

privacy-policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy-policy.desc: Leadvisor Global respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your data, as well as your rights when accessing and using our platform.
privacy-policy.personal-data-collect-desc: We collect and process the following types of personal data:
privacy-policy.personal-data-provide-p1: Account Information: When you register for an account, we collect details such as your name, contact information, account credentials.
privacy-policy.personal-data-provide-p2: User Content: Any data, prompts, or files you upload or input into our Services.
privacy-policy.personal-data-provide-p3: Communication Information: If you interact with us through emails, social media, or support channels, we collect your name, contact information, and message content.
privacy-policy.personal-data-provide-p4: Other Information You Provide: Data submitted through surveys, training programs, or other forms.
privacy-policy.personal-data-receive-title: Personal Data We Receive from Your Use of Our Services:
privacy-policy.personal-data-receive-p1: Log Data: Your IP address, browser type, settings, and details about your usage of the Service.
privacy-policy.personal-data-receive-p2: Usage Data: Information about your interactions, such as content engagement, feature usage, and time zone.
privacy-policy.personal-data-receive-p3: Device Information: Details about your device, operating system, and browser settings.
privacy-policy.personal-data-receive-p4: Location Information: Approximate location based on IP address for security and service personalization.
privacy-policy.personal-data-receive-p5: Cookies and Similar Technologies: We use cookies to enhance user experience and maintain session preferences. Refer to our Cookie Notice for details.
privacy-policy.data-retention-desc: We retain personal data for as long as necessary for service delivery, legal compliance, and legitimate business purposes. The retention period depends on service requirements, data sensitivity, potential risks, legal obligations, and regulatory requirements.
privacy-policy.security-measures-desc: We implement reasonable technical and organizational measures to protect personal data against unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. This includes encryption, access controls, and periodic reviews of our security practices.
privacy-policy.data-transfers-desc: We may process and store your personal data outside of your country of residence. Where such international transfers occur, we ensure adequate safeguards are in place to comply with applicable data protection laws.
privacy-policy.contact-information-desc: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in technology, law, or our business operations. Please review this page periodically for the latest information. If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:contact@leadvisor.net

delete-account.alert-desc: Deleting your account will erase all data and cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to continue?
